snippet: Madhulika Sikka, currently the executive producer of "Morning Edition,'' will supervise the newsroom, replacing Dick Meyer, who left to join BBC News America.
abstract: Madhulika Sikka, currently the executive producer of "Morning Edition,'' will supervise the newsroom, replacing Dick Meyer, who left to join BBC News America.

headline.main: NPR Appoints Executive from 'Morning Edition' to Oversee All News Coverage
